website_summaries.verdict: A good quality soft-sided suitcase that offers a lot of packing space.
pros: Available in 3 different colors and includes a 10 year limited warranty
Features wheels that roll in multiple directions and expands on all sides for more packing space
Can hold a lot of items for a standard-sized piece of luggage
cons: Some had issues with the suitcase falling apart quickly

customer_reviews.title: Spirit personal sized luggage!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got stopped by the spirit flight attendant and she made me put it in the sizer ... I stuffed this thing to the max . But it fit snugly, she was shocked . Then asked where I got the bag. I absolutely recommend If your trying to save money! Totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Spirit Airlines “personal item”
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suitcase to bring a Spirit Airlines flight without paying a fee for carry on luggage. It worked. The bag is the exact dimensions allowed for a “personal item“. I packed four days worth of clothes, a toiletry bag and a small purse without overstuffing it. The one drawback I will mention is that, though it fits in the allotted space under the seat, it juts out lengthwise far enough to significantly reduce leg/foot room. It was worth it for me because I’m short and was able to rest my feet on top of the bag. Somebody taller might find it uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Yo

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, maneuverable, and worthless. I would give it zero stars if I could. The zipper broke on the first flight. I didn’t recognize my pretty new luggage when it arrived at baggage claim after one round-trip flight, held together with tape and wrapped in plastic. American Tourister should be ashamed of themselves for selling such a poor quality product. At one time, this company was well-known and trusted for its good quality merchandise, so I feel deeply disappointed and, frankly, cheated. My last suitcase easily weathered ten years of international flights, and still looks and performs great. This one couldn’t make it once to Texas and back to Seattle!
customer_reviews.author: thorsprincess

customer_reviews.title: Suitcase came unsewn after 1 flight :(
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this suitcase! The color is great and the size is perfect. It seemed like a quality suitcase. Unfortunately, however, the suitcase has already begun to come apart after only 1 journey. It wasn't over-packed or too heavy, but the bottom of the suitcase is already coming unsewn. Wishing I could return or exchange as maybe mine is a bit faulty, but it's already been used.
customer_reviews.author: M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions listed for this *21-inch* spinner are simply NOT TRUE.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be very well made; BUT the dimensions listed in the specs are wrong - they apply to the inside of the case. It is too big for Alaska Airlines' size limits for use as a carry on. At 23" X 14.25 X 11, the actual dimensions exceed those allowed (22" X 14" X 9"). So according to Alaska's Customer Care department, it would be allowed only as checked luggage at their usual fee. It makes me wonder if American Tourister has mis-stated the dimensions for all of their alleged "carry-on" bags. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LeeB

customer_reviews.title: Update on Response from Samsonite/American Tourister
customer_reviews.text: I previously complained about the suitcase, which easily damaged. I don't take that back. But I want to say the service from Samsonite was excellent. I decided to call them and spoke to someone who sent me a prepaid return label. I only paid for the UPS box, which was $7, as I had thrown out the original box. I sent the suitcase back as it was under warranty, and they determined they couldn't fix it. Instead they let me choose another suitcase and sent it to be right away. The turnover was very quick.
customer_reviews.author: RSK

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag for discount airline travel
customer_reviews.text: I just came back from a trip on Spirit Airlines and this fell within their definition of a free personal carry-on. Considering that Spirit and other similar airlines charge about $40 one way for baggage, this bag basically pays for itself, but you have to pack smart. My trip was 4 days / 3 nights and I could just fit enough clothes in there for that length of time. The bag is very sturdy and easy to carry with the handles. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for carry-on!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to serve as a carry-on bag for my travel needs and it serves me perfectly. I have used it one time so far with Delta and didn't face any problem as dimensions are perfect. The style and quality are perfect! Would definitely recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size bag for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great size bag for travel. I travel alot for work. However, I overpacked it and ripped the handle of it yesterday trying to get it out from under the seat in front of me. The zippers are great. The bag is great. The handles, obviously are a little weak.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Surges

customer_reviews.title: Fits Under American Airline's Economy Seat
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice bag. It fits under the American Airline economy seats (not much space for my large feet). I did have a little trouble with the zipper on one sde of the bag. I was able to fit a pair of sandals beneath the lining in between the bars housing the adjustable handle. I rolled my clothing before packing and was able to get quite a bit in the bag. Towel, 3 pants, 4 t-shirts, pajamas, flip flops (also stored beneath lining), underwear, washcloths and toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lea

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure I won't be able to keep it prestine, but I'd rather not start out with it dirty. It was like this out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rosehill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality finally!
customer_reviews.text: My previous American tourister lasted two trips and gave up. This one did a journey around half the world with 6 airport hops and showed barely any signs of wear. Hoping this will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kat B

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suitcase! Buying something sight unseen is always nerve-wracking. Three flights and 2+ weeks on a coach tour and this bag is none the worse for wear. Great color that can be seen at baggage claim in a sea of black luggage. Holds and organizes a lot of stuff, neatly, and the wheels and zippers run very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Mink73a

customer_reviews.title: Great color, lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Pros: color is nice, lots of room for a carry on, swivel wheels. Cons: the wheels “pull” to the side, like a car that needs an alignment. If you’re pulling it behind you it fine but if you roll it upright beside you it’ll pull to the side. I gave up and just pull it at an angle behind me
customer_reviews.author: Eden McFadden

customer_reviews.title: I loved that feature
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly on my flight with spirit. It did fit under the seat. I loved that feature. It did fit a good amount of items.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah lee

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit the personal item.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit the personal item size.had to pay extra. Wonder who is going to compensate my loss.
customer_reviews.author: Naria

customer_reviews.title: Zippers and wheels smooth
customer_reviews.text: Right size. Wheels smooth to turn. Lots of compartments. Zippers smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harlow-Schott

customer_reviews.title: Does not wear well!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. I ordered the turquoise luggage color and besides the luggage not holding up well it shows everything. After two trips on a plane it looks older than the luggage I replaced. I will get the hard case luggage next time. This is pretty new and resonably priced but very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: NannyGranny

customer_reviews.title: Fits on Spirit
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bag! Yes, it does fly on Spirit as a personal item. First flight I put it in the overhead bin. Second flight I tried it under seat, and while it does fit, it's pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best carry-on underseat roller bag
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and only bring carry-on luggage. This bag is amazeballs! Getting older had me wanting a roller bag to take the strain off my shoulders of carrying my normal weekender. The pictures are onboard a coast to coast Alaska Air (window seat) flight and you can see it fits both ways. The front pocket is big and super convenient to stuff inflight crap like earbuds, Kindle, snacks, Xanax, etc. I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great size, and no extra weight to
customer_reviews.text: I have always relied on American Tourister and they did not let me down. The spinner feature makes it ever so easy to move around in the airport and in parking lots to load into vehicles. Next, I carry heavy expensive outdoor and photography gear and the soft sides worked great. They keep the weight down and if you know how to pack nothing gets damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, exactly the personal item size for Spirit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, exactly the personal item size for Spirit Airlines. Fit perfectly under the seat- and the best part is that it cost less than paying for a carry-on or checked bag! It’s roomy, too, despite the compact size. I was able to fit enough clothes for 5 days in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose o'the Mountain

customer_reviews.title: perfect as a personal item for travelling with Spirit
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than expected. It's not four wheels as advertised. However it is perfect as a personal item for travelling with Spirit. Update: The bag is a bit small so I often revert back to using my duffle bag for more space.
customer_reviews.author: Scoop

customer_reviews.title: Spirit personal Item sized, 2019!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room, handle easily telescoped out, generous outside pocket that fit my ipad. And most importantly, it fit within the guidelines for Spirit personal item, May 2019. I packed one board game ( Grand Austria Hotel) that had room in the box for 2 lightweight long sleeved shirts and 4 pair undergarments. Also, 2 pairs of jeans, 2 sweater shirts,another thinner shirt, my iphone battery bank, 1 pair of Toms, long sleeved flannel pajama top, pair of sweat pants, socks, toothpaste/brush, and other smaller misc items. Room to spare at the checker. Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: E. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: After one use the wheels don't work. They just don't spin properly and when pulling on just 2 front wheels, they get stuck in one position and just burn without spinning. Actually burnt my finger when touching it to see what was wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Margaretti

customer_reviews.title: Good space and the pull handle doesn't take up as ...
customer_reviews.text: Took me quite some time to locate these exact measurements. Fits perfectly under the seat of a Frontier airplane. Good space and the pull handle doesn't take up as much room as others that are on the market.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, carry strap ripped out
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bag for short trips on airlines that charge for a carryon. It's surprisingly roomy and fits more than I thought. But one of the carry straps ripped out while out of the country which made it really difficult to use, particularly on small planes with steps. It was neither overpacked or abused. We couldn't find anywhere to fix it when we got back, so we had to junk it. I
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Zippers
customer_reviews.text: Strong overall construction. I jammed this thing full with over 60 lbs of stuff and it made it from Chicago to LA to Costa completely intact.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but bad zipper design.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size bag for carry on, but with one problem. The bag is a good size, but the zipper design is poor. The zipper roller over the top edge in a curved design which makes it hard to close. The bag is smaller at the top than the bottom, so closing the zipper is a downhill process. If this was a simple cube with square corners, it would be fine and easily zipped shut. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ted J.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: The previous American Tourister rolling suitcase that I had was bigger in the length and width dimensions, but its wheels were more recessed so it fit within the maximum size allowances required by my airline. Since the wheels on this one stick out more, I had to get a smaller one, but the expandable feature gives me about the same amount of room that my other one had. Plus it's lighter than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: JON KING

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a frontier flight. Was happy to give my smug smile when the airline employee who had been threatening my handicapped mother with $50 gate baggage fees, had to watch me easily slide it in and out of the stupid “personal item” sizer. Oh yeah, and they worked perfectly, even while stuffed to the gills! Bought 5 and was able to pack a weeks worth of clothes for a family of 5, including an Xbox and laptop!
customer_reviews.author: ShesAbsolutelyAmazing

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient little bag that fits in smaller planes
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bag. It holds more than it looks like it should - plenty for a weekend trip. And best of all it fits in the overhead bin of the small regional carriers which I'm forced to take from midwestern airports. Highly recommend this bag for those who make short trips on planes, particulary small planes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hubers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size taken as personal item by airlines like Frontier.
customer_reviews.text: This is something a money saver. Because low cost airline will charge $30 for carry on. So better carry this size of bag and save $30 everytime you travel. This size of bag is considered as personal item and free (just as laptop bag or big backpack). I packed one suit two half sweaters, nite dress two shirts and other personal items. Only one draw back is when you place this item underneath the seat your legs cannot be stretched fully. If the flight is long hrs you should take as carry-on and pay the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best investment in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this bag! Best purchased I’ve made in a long time. If you are willing to fly spirit or frontier and not pay for a carry on. This is it!!! I was nervous that it wouldn’t fit, but it does. Don’t over stuff and you’ll be good. No more paying fees for carry on bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Guy

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is stiff!
customer_reviews.text: Does fit under seat but had a hard time zipping and unzipping. The zipper has to be in line perfectly to get it to zip closed. Which can be frustrating in the hustle and bustle of airport security. Also makes it difficult on plane to access items you need if you are using it to store items you will be using during your flight.
customer_reviews.author: Holly McElwain

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that would make this better would be wheels that spun 360
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly underneath United economy seat. just big enough for anything you'd need on a flight. The only thing that would make this better would be wheels that spun 360.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Max Size For Frontier and Spirit Personal Item
customer_reviews.text: Max size for free personal item on Frontier and Spirit. Don't overstuff the bag, it is exactly the max size. Sturdy material and sturdy zippers. Rolls nicely. Pull handle wiggles a bit but is probably ok. Can easily fit enough items for a 3-day trip + electronics. 4 trips later I am fully satisfied with the bag and capacity. The cost to buy this bag is less than one checked bag so I now have 3×$65 more cash in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Stitching could be better.
customer_reviews.text: So upon arrival I can say I love the concept. The under seat luggage does have a little weight but offers good space, 3 additional zipper pockets and an inside strap. This bag would be perfect with the carry on for a two week stay. My only concern as previous reviews have mentioned is the stitch work. I have Not yet traveled with this luggage but will be taking an international trip in a month or so so I’ll be sure to update on how the luggage held up. Overall this is a cute purple and hot pink luggage set that I know I can Easily spot on the conveyor belt
customer_reviews.author: Nita pete

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed...will be returning.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the bag was fine - the zipper is a bit difficult to pull up and very stiff, but fit many things for a small suitcase and slid right under the seat in front of us on the plane. DOWNFALL and I will be returning these (I bought two): The telescoping handles are JUNK! Once pulled up, the pin does not pop out to stay put - the handle falls right back in, you can make it a bit shorter, but again, the handle just falls. Very poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Gimster Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Spirit Airlines.
customer_reviews.text: Flying Spirit? PERFECT SIZE! I just bought my 3rd one. Other luggage have protruding wheels which counts in the 18 inch allowance (so you lose valuable packing space). This one does not. Easy to zipper, easy to steer, and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Lajojogogo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Personal Item
customer_reviews.text: This product is built to the current specifications of what constitutes a "personal item" for certain airlines. You can verify that information on each individual airline's website. It worked for me on Frontier. I packed clothes and toiletries for four days and everything fit well, including my purse. It is easy to go through security with this item. It kind of eats into your leg room but saves you your hard-earned moola. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frontier and Spirit
customer_reviews.text: Fits Frontier and Spirit as a under-seat personal item if you want to save some money since they both charge for carry-ons. BUT, it is really easy to stuff this thing and I am pretty sure it wont fit front to back in their test units at the gate if you do. The advantage of this over some soft bag is that this was designed just to meet the two carriers limits and in theory, you can pack the maximum amount as any other bag will be a little shorter or not as wide as the absolute maximum allowed (so one extra pair of socks?!!).
customer_reviews.author: Doc Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase started to come apart after 1 trip. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A Carboni

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet, but I love the color, it maneuvers well, and seems as if it will hold quite a bit. My only concern is that the wheels make it technically an inch too tall for a carry-on, but I usually fly American so I don't expect that it will be an issue. I have seen people with carry-ons that were bigger on American, and I was always resentful that I paid to check my bag while the attendants were just taking theirs for free to check. So, I don't anticipate any problems. I occasionally fly Allegiant, and that is a bit of a concern with the size though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works on Spirit, fit 5 days worth
customer_reviews.text: If this really did have spinner wheels I'd have given it a 5. I think the spinner wheels are on a more expensive model. Took this on Spirit with no issues-although on newer Spirit plane the fit was tighter than on older Spirit plane. Going to warmer climate got 5 days of clothes plus pair of sandals in it. Going to colder location still 5 days of clothes but couldn't fit sandals in it. Has held up on 2 trips so far, everything working.
customer_reviews.author: MomoffourCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Fits under American Airlines seat fully packed!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this suitcase. It's the perfect size for a short vacation and completely fits under the seat on an American Airlines plane. Note: I completely utilized every inch of space in this bag fully.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hills

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in baggage fees saved, flt after flt
customer_reviews.text: Laughed my way in and out of the airplane. Gate agents recognize the bag and see money flying out of their revenue pocket. I strongly recommend the black bag over the blue because most durability issues seem to be with the blue one judging by the reviews. I got 1 week of clothing, travel size toiletries, snacks and my 13" macbook pro in with no problem. Front pocket will only hold 13" laptop. Anything bigger and you risk damage opening and not being able to zipper. Hope that helps those of you looking to purchase. #spirit #frontier
customer_reviews.author: handonhobby

customer_reviews.title: Love the matching American Tourister luggage!
customer_reviews.text: I took this bag to New York with me and it was such a good companion. I already had the underseat luggage to match and really wanted to convert to a 360 spinner for this trip. This is a good bag, but when it gets heavy, it’s hard to maneuver. For the price and the style, would I have traded it? No way! I love and will enjoy it for years to come. It fit nicely in overhead on American. It was decently easy to maneuver on solid floors (carpet was a tad bit difficult when it was full), and the handle seemed very sturdy. I love the fabric. Top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Farris

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this for the first time when I leave for upstate NY on Aug 9 So far, in handling it, it is lightweight which is great as I am 83, and easy to maneuver. I question the durability only because it is soft sided and seems to be made of something like burlap-some kind of a very durable material. So I hope it will last. Not sure. Love the color and the size. Wish it had an exterior label area. Like the push button for the handle. All in all I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: SisterSinful

customer_reviews.title: This is 18x14x8 the size allowed for the personal bag for American Airlines under seat bag..
customer_reviews.text: I was in a bind my clothing fit in my carry-on bag and personal size bag (smaller than this one) but my essential bpap machine would not. I took a chance and ordered this bag 3 days before flying and it was receiving in 2 days..yay.. The bag WORKS bpap fits with extra room around it to put toiletries so other essentials can go in carry-on. Happy to have this as I will be flying Spirit next year and others have said this is the only bag allowed without a fee. I wish the other matching bag wasn't over the carry-on size I would have bought it to match.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Spirit Airlines underseat.
customer_reviews.text: You can fit a lot of clothes in these. They honestly where only slightly smaller then our bigger luggage. If we wanted too we could have dropped a few outfits and just took these. They fit under the seats on spirit just fine. But you are sacrificing foot space... Like I had either put my feet slightly on top or to the sides... But they were within regulation and we had no issues. Sooo We put these on top of out other bags when going threw the airport... My daughter (6) pulled hers and... It was a pain... Since the wheels were not ones the swivel... But we were just happy they were within regulation for spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin silver

customer_reviews.title: ... luggage I have brought in more than 10yrs very easy to move easy to clean and will be purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is first piece of luggage I have brought in more than 10yrs very easy to move easy to clean and will be purchasing the other sizes available
customer_reviews.author: msdi

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, travelled with it, and it worked out great. The spinner wheels are very nice, the zippers worked without fault, and faired well moving through the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Chelley42

customer_reviews.title: A great cheap travel case
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this on 2 business trips. It fits well in the overhead bins and the wheels, zippers and handle all feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Flick

customer_reviews.title: This product is very poor quality. The handle broke before I even got ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poor quality. The handle broke before I even got to the airport. Zippers come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Spirit Personal item
customer_reviews.text: Love this suitcase! I bought this specifically for the free personal item included on Spirit Airlines and it fits! It's very spacious for its size and has a nice size pocket on the front and one inside. I was able to fit 3 pairs of yoga pants, 2 pairs of sleep shorts, 4 t- shirts, a medium sized make up bag, a small toiletry bag, my electric toothbrush with case, a tumbler for water, a micro plush blanket and my small cross body purse. I would definitely recommend especially if you're flying on a budget airplane that charges for carry-ons like Spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Small / underseat Carry on perfection
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for most airline, I am 5ft tall and getting things in the overhead bin is hard so I wanted a carry on I could put under my seat. I loved traveling with this luggage. I think the only thing that would make it better would be 4 wheels making it a spinner. All in all it fit what i needed an outfit some toiletries and other bits and pieces I wanted on hand while I traveled. So if you are looking for a smaller then average carry on look into this one.
customer_reviews.author: BlackRose

customer_reviews.title: Fits Spirit airlines specifications
customer_reviews.text: I love this little suitcase. I bought it because I was flying Spirit Airlines and I needed something that met their personal item qualifications. It fit in Spirits bin with no problem. It's quality made and had more space than I expected. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Plus size beauty

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just tends to be front heavy
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for the last 3 weeks traveling 6 countries in Europe. This included many trains, planes, cars, buses. Product held up well and is a great size. (But is slightly larger than the carry-on bag that most European airlines allow...so I had to check it for those. The only downside to it is that it is kind of front heavy. It can fall forward when standing up empty, but is also sensitive to falling when standing upright and full. Tried to pack heavier stuff in the back of the bottom, but it would occasionally just fall over anyway. which was frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Stoker

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several of these small cases but decided on this one. i travel just on weekends usually and needed a small case just to carry on the plane. This has plenty of room for a change of clothes, pair of shoes, night clothes, etc. plus all my cosmetics and small bottles of shampoo, cleansers, etc. Used just once but seems sturdy. It has a pull-out handle so you don't have to carry it. Fits perfectly in upper compartment on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of (small) luggage
customer_reviews.text: This little bag works great with those super cheap airlines that nickel-and-dime you for every possible thing (I’m looking in your direction, Spirit). Itfut right under the seat and will likely work with the other airlines, too. If you know how to pack, this thing will hold a surprising amount. I fit all my clothes and toiletries in this bag for a seven day trip. Now mind you, it took some effort, and for me it was the absolute max. Ideally I’ll just use this on short trips, say three or four days. But I do recommend it based on my early usage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Young

customer_reviews.title: Does not open flat.
customer_reviews.text: This case holds more than similar cases of the same size with multiple pockets. I tried, so I know. The one negative about this underseater is that it does not unzip to open fully, or flat. You have to hold up the top as you fill it. Even my 2 year old grandkids suitcases open up flat. Not sure why the zipper doesn’t open fully.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on that qualifies as a free personal item
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how much I could pack in this, and still have room to put my purse in, so I didn't have to pay for a carry on. This is within the max dimensions TSA and most airlines allow for the "1" free personal item because it fits under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must have for airplane travel.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this bag before I left on a trip for Africa. It was a lifesaver. Held a lot and fit under the seat. I’ve had shoulder replacement and I’m not supposed to lift 10 pounds over my head so putting it in the overhead compartment was not an option. Then I put my feet on it to elevate my leg somewhat . I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Scott

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely happy with this purchase, was just what I was looking for as far as size. If you pack it correctly you won't have issues with it falling over, and you don't need to over think the packing either. I did purchase compression bags because I was looking for something small and light weight but good for a week or two of travel. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good luck with the zipper
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size and color. I would love it except the zipper is a nightmare to work. Since it has to zip in a somewhat circular way around the opening it is very hard to zip. I feared I was going to break it each time I had to try to zip or unzip the case. I purchased this case ahead of time for an upcoming trip I took about a month and a half later. I wish I had tried it out before the trip because now it's too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on
customer_reviews.text: This was great carry on. The size allows you to wheel it down aisle of plane. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda DeCota

customer_reviews.title: Good suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Nice case but wasn’t quite big enough for use as sewing machine travel bag but I liked it so I kept it
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but will not last more than 7-8 months!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this bag. Took it to Europe and could fit a month’s worth of stuff in there. Love the color but the only issue is it gets dirty really quickly. However it didn’t last not even a year. In 6 months the zipper showed signs of ripping and the pull up handle didn’t work. Put in a claim with Samsonite they said it isn’t covered and the repairs would be $90. Save yourself the hassle and buy a good case from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal-Gayle O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Handle doesn't always stay locked in place
customer_reviews.text: I did not use my rolling tote till about a month or so after purchasing (which put it past the return date). Only having 2 back wheels which do not swivel I found it awkward and hard to maneuver. The size was perfect for fitting under a Spirit Airline seat but on my last trip to Florida the handle didn't want to stay locked in position which was VERY annoying. I've only used this rolling tote on two trips and I'm 68 yrs old so excessive or abusive treatment was not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent luggage for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is great case for the price. Bought this for my mom to come on a trip to visit me (thanks amazon for making it easy to do from 12 hours away :)) She loves the color and it was easy to spot on the conveyor belt. Only time will tel how it holds up, but so far it’s looking good.
customer_reviews.author: gaterose

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Much to small to fit anything. An could not get anything into it easily as the front is too unwieldy. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.  Wille

customer_reviews.title: She is thirteen and loved it. It held all her clothes she needed
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter took this to Rome. She is thirteen and loved it. It held all her clothes she needed. She had a back pack the same color for her electronics and camera stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hosler

customer_reviews.title: It has what I was looking for at the price I wanted to pay
customer_reviews.text: It has everything that I was looking for: medium size, outside pockets, spinner wheels & well made. The reviews regarding exact measurements don't concern me because it won't be used for air travel. It's a bit heavier than I expected, but I would rather it be heavier & durable than light weight & flimsy. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Chilly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Spirit Personal item
customer_reviews.text: I love it, perfect size for spirits personal item. It fits in the sizer- everyone was shocked lol! After I got pass the spirit check everyone asked where I got it. Fit in 2 pairs of sneakers, 2 bathing suits, 3 dresses, 1 shorts... flip flops all the necessities! Love it
customer_reviews.author: DejaNYC

customer_reviews.title: Carried my sewing machine on Southwest with no problem
customer_reviews.text: I looked at lots of small carry on bags for one that would fit my sewing machine. Didn't trust baggage handling not to break the machine. This was just the right size with room for padding around it. The bag is good looking, sturdy, roomy for it's size and rolls well. the only improvement would be spinner wheels.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Wheels work great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this suitcase. It looks really nice, packs very well and the wheels work great. Very easy to maneuver around the airport.
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: Useful, compact underseat luggage, but strong odor
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for our first Spirit Airlines flight. So handy that we may use them all the time! Pared down to just what we need to bring. The only issue is a strong plastic odor, like the cheap recycled Chinese manufactured rubber of years ago... Dissipated somewhat after one use. Stop using toxic waste for materials please, American tourister...
customer_reviews.author: FiveFormTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived like beautiful nesting dolls each case inside the other. Zero defects, color is gorgeous, maneuverability of the wheels are insane! They can 360!! Material appears super durable. I’m insanely happy with this purchase and I can’t wait to use them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Howard

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after just two uses
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of the zipper issue, the bag is perfect for a personal-item flight option. There is no reason the zipper should have broke. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Saves you MONEY and Gives Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: This product was SUPER GREAT for traveling. I forced myself to pack light for a trip to Virginia for a wedding and then to Disney. I did it all in this suitcase. I just had to wash my clothes twice for an 8 day trip. Not bad. I didn't have to worry about my luggage arriving to the destination on time and it ultimately saved me money on the airfare. I'm SUPER HAPPY with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: The Wheels Don't roll smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I recently took a trip and this luggage was a headache. I could barely maneuver the largest bag in the airport. It rolled in all the wrong directions. If you are big on the wheels this may not be the set for you. I am returning my set, If I have any problems, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a weekend trip
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I ordered this bag. It fits the dimension limits for Spirit and a Frontier as a personal item. I was able to fit everything I needed for an overnight trip with room to spare, and I avoided paying for a carry-on It is very light and the wheels make it easy to drag thru the airport.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Joppru

customer_reviews.title: Very fine quality and wel-thought bag
customer_reviews.text: Extra compartment for socks is great! The inside design if very good for packing compactly, e.g. the whole volume of the bag is available for the main internal compartment, with additional bags and zippers all around. Zippers are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mergen Alimaganbetov

customer_reviews.title: It fits under the seat
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for under the seat on Frontier as long as you turn it sideways. Rolls easily and holds more than I thought it would. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: long time customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for carryon. Quality is lacking, stitches and zipper area not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yaajer

customer_reviews.title: Checked it once came through just fine. Good space
customer_reviews.text: Just right size for carry on , flee two different airlines. Checked it once came through just fine. Good space.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTME

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: This little bag is small but mighty. It stows under the passenger seat perfectly. I can pack 7 shirts, 3 pairs of jeans, 3 pairs of shorts, under clothes for a week, 1 swimsuit, and 1 pair of sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Nana56

customer_reviews.title: Spirit legal and surprisingly adequate
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bag in order to be able to "carry on" for a business flight on Spirit Airlines. I was able to actually pack my laptop and my suit (see YouTube for turning inside-out technique) , shirt, underwear and toiletries with plenty of room to spare. Took another trip on Spirit the following long weekend and my wife (a fussy dresser) was able to pack several outfits - You have to plan ahead but, if she can do it, I suspect you can too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Jo Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as your personal item!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as my personal item on a frontier flight. It does fit sideways under the seat like it should unless you have the window seat and then it has to go lengthwise, which leaves little foot room but it does work. I was able to pack carefully for a four day stay. Lots of you tube videos available on how to maximize the space. Very easy to handle and roll, very sturdy little bag at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag/great value
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought this roller bag. It rolls smoothly and carries A LOT! Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid carry-on
customer_reviews.text: My teen took this carry-on on an American Airlines flight and it worked great. She's tiny and had no trouble maneuvering it through the airport. It held a week's worth of summer clothes, held its shape and got the job done. I'm thinking of buying another one for myself. Good bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ripley Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Exceedingly happy with this purchase. Its so much bigger than my previous carryon and its still legal! I have so much more space to pack and the spinners make my life so much easier at the airport. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Dana Winand

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have successfully utilized this bag on a Spirit flight and a Southwest flight. SO if you are wondering if this will fit underneath the seat in front of you, yes it does. If it were any bigger it wouldn't fit. I really like this bag as it makes it easy to travel and fits 4-5 outfits plus a makeup bag and a few other little things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for airline "Personal Item"
customer_reviews.text: I loved mine so much I bought this one for my hubby. Has saved us a ton on luggage fees. Well made. Sturdy. I can pack it tight without the worry of weak zippers or fabric. The handle will not last forever but if I don't abuse it, it should be fine for quite a while. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: luvlemonade

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, lightweight, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: We took 2 of these on a trip to Europe. They survived 6 different flights and were comfortable to carry. Very spacious and lightweight. We did buy some luggage covers so the luggage looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Martinta

customer_reviews.title: Largest bag on the internet that will fit under the seat.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far, but so far so great! I took it on Frontier and had no problem with it being a free carryon.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Burrage

customer_reviews.title: Personal Item on Spirit Airlines
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly on Spirit airline as your personal item! If you want to avoid paying luggage fees on Spirit (and Frontier Airlines) get this bag! Yes, it's small but perfect for a weekend or a little longer trip as long as you know how to pack. I will get a lot of use out of this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera Case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a camera bag (fits 2 SLR cameras in cases) but will also give it a try on a plane trip. See if they insist I check in at the door, or let me into the plane for an under the seat bag.
customer_reviews.author: PhotosByMeta

customer_reviews.title: It meets Spirit Airlines free bag size
customer_reviews.text: I travel light and this bag surprisingly packs a lot of essentials. I got it for the free carry on on Spirit Airlines and it meets their requirements.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

product_meta.title: American Tourister 4 Kix Expandable Softside Luggage with Spinner Wheels, Teal, Checked-Large 28-Inch
product_meta.description: Size:Checked-Large 28-Inch| Color:TealThis 4 KIX takes functional and thoughtful design to a higher level. All cases expand 1.5", single airflow Spinner Wheels. Color pop interior with cross straps and Large diagonal blouse Pocket. Easy grip soft co molded zipper pulls with sonic welded logo.
feature_bullets: 28" Spinner Luggage maximizes your Packing power and is the ideal checked bag for longer trips
Packing Dimensions: 28.25" x 19.0" x 10.5", Overall Dimensions: 31.5" x 19.5" x 13.2", Weight: 9.5 pounds

10 Year Limited Warranty: American Tourister products are rigorously tested to ensure our products meet stringent standards; This bag comes with a 10 Year Warranty against defects in materials and workmanship
Four Multi Directional single Spinner Wheels allow 360 degree upright rolling so there is no weight on your arm or shoulder
Push Button locking handles provides easy maneuverability when extended out from the suitcase, and stores neatly inside when not in use
Large INTERIOR Packing compartment with blouse Pocket door panel
CORNER PROTECTORS guard against wear and tear at critical contact points
1.5" Expansion to allow you to pack more items and compression keeps clothing neatly pressed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,257 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
